summary: A young heiress finds evidence suggesting that at night she acts under the influence of a family curse and has begun committing ghastly murders in a nearby park.
cast: Don Porter|June Lockhart|Sara Haden|Jan Wiley|Lloyd Corrigan|Dennis Hoey|Martin Kosleck|Eily Malyon|Frederick Worlock|Clara Blandick|James Finlayson|Olaf Hytten|Warren Jackson|William H. O'Brien|Brick Sullivan|David Thursby|Joan Wells
keywords: fiance fiancee relationship|horse drawn carriage|mysterious woman|serial killer|police inspector
title: She-Wolf of London
